page.title: 05RECREATION IN HAWICK
page.content:
Many different hobbies are enjoyed in Hawick. Most popular are walking ,gardening and swimming. Also quite enjoyed are bowling,golf,squash and snooker. The Teviotdale Leisure Centre provides good facilites for swimming,bowling squash. The beautiful countryside and park provide interesting walks. Nearly everyone in Hawick has a garden to tend. The most popular activities are baking and listening to a variety of music. People also like to make wine,decorate their homes,read and go to concerts.
Many people enjoyed visiting the cinema but unfortunateley it closed down on June 5th 1985. !TI03760102
